entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
